data.name: Sandra and Woo in the Cursed Adventure - Game Guide
data.detailed_description:
This guide contains the solutions for all puzzles in Sandra and Woo in the Cursed Adventure.

Beware: Using the guide may drastically shorten the playing time and reduce the overall fun. Point-and-click adventures are all about solving puzzles. Therefore, we highly recommend only using the guide when you’re really stuck and have no idea what to do anymore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) / 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: PDF reader or Open Office

  • OS: Windows 7/10
